hero.title: Transform Your Selfies Into
hero.description: Instantly create thousands of hyper-realistic, AI-generated photos for social media, profile pictures, marketing, or personal projects with our next-gen AI photo studio.

features.title: Core Features
features.description: Why our AI photo generator leads the market

advancedAI.title: Next-Gen AI Engine
advancedAI.description: Powered by Flux.1™ deep-learning models for unmatched realism, detail, and creative control in every AI-generated image.

privacyFirst.title: Built-in Privacy Control
privacyFirst.description: Choose public or private galleries, and permanently delete your photos anytime—your data, your way.

affordablePricing.title: Transparent, Low-Cost Pricing
affordablePricing.description: No subscriptions, no surprises. One-time AI training from $4.99 + just $0.03 per image—scale up without scale-up costs.

thousandsOfStyles.title: Endless Creative Styles
thousandsOfStyles.description: Explore built-in presets or hit “Surprise Me!” to generate thousands of unique AI-style renditions instantly.

easyCustomization.title: Intuitive Prompt Builder
easyCustomization.description: Fine-tune your prompts or remix public gallery photos for bespoke, professional-grade AI images in seconds.

multiplatform.title: Cross-Platform Access
multiplatform.description: Use our web app or native iOS & Android apps—automatically sync your AI photo library across all devices.

gallery.title: Public Gallery
gallery.description: Fresh photos from our users: the latest AI-generated photos.

pricing.title: Simple, Pay-As-You-Go Pricing
pricing.description: Only pay for what you use. No monthly fees—just powerful AI photo generation at a fraction of the cost.
pricing.perfectFor: Ideal for influencers, businesses, creators, and anyone craving stunning AI imagery.

download.title: Start Generating Today
download.description: Download our AI photo studio or launch the web app—create professional AI images in under a minute.

webApp.title: Web App
webApp.description: No install needed. Access your AI studio instantly in any browser.

mobileApps.title: Mobile Apps
mobileApps.description: Full-featured native apps for iOS & Android—create AI images on the go.

footer.title: My AI Photo Shoot
footer.description: Create, customize, and share stunning AI-generated photos—powered by state-of-the-art deep learning.
footer.copyright: © 2025 My AI Photo Shoot. All rights reserved.

supportPage.title: Customer Support
supportPage.description: Encounter an issue or have a question? Our support team is ready to help within 24-48 hours.

form.success: Thank you! We’ve received your message and will reply soon.
form.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
form.privacyNotice: We’ll only use your email to respond and never share it with third parties.
